bug.author: kshitij12345
bug.description:
The build is crashing due
chainer/chainerx_cc/chainerx/cuda/cuda_device/reduction.cu
Line 149 in 1e3b666
CHAINERX_REGISTER_OP_CUDA(AMinOp, CudaAMinOp);
and
chainer/chainerx_cc/chainerx/native/native_device/reduction.cc
Line 126 in 1e3b666
CHAINERX_REGISTER_OP_NATIVE(AMinOp, NativeAMinOp);

comments.comment: Should be fixed now that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chainer/chainer/pull/6922>#6922</denchmark-link> is merged.
